api_keys._comment: For development, you can place keys here. However, for security, it is STRONGLY recommended to use environment variables (e.g., GEMINI_API_KEY). The loading script will always prioritize environment variables over values in this file.

models._comment: Define the default models for different roles across all agents.

agents._comment: Agent-specific configurations. These settings will be used to generate the tool-specific config files (e.g., .claude/settings.json).
